A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a big Star Wars fan I was very disappointed in that movie. Most of the characters felt bland\, the story was boring. The death of snoke was lame af\, and as villain he was childish and very disappointing with zero back story. But the worst part was how this movie felt like a caricature of star wars with some cheesy ass jokes every 2 sec and some force morals like ''dont hurt the animals'' and ''dont eat the cute one''. And some very awkward and misplace kissing scene. Over all the film felt like a big and sad joke for the fans.
